config.settings.cmds.cmdHelpEmbed.info.t:
Gives you info on a the {{commandName2}} command's settings.

`{{prefix}}[[settings commands]] {{commandName}} [[view]]`
Whitelist or blacklist certain roles or users from using the {{commandName2}} command. Also toggles between whitelist or blacklist modes.

`{{prefix}}[[settings commands]] {{commandName}} [[[whitelist|blacklist] [add|remove|enable|disable|view]]] <user|role>`
config.settings.cmds.cmdHelpEmbed.setCoo:

game.startgame.channelGreeting:
Welcome to the [[Uno-Channel]]! Use it to play your cards during the game!

**Basic Commands**
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[play]] <color of card> <number of card | type of card>` to play your cards.
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[draw]]` if you don't have any matching cards.
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[cards]]` if you don't know the name of your card.
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[say]]` to talk to your opponents.

**Activated Game Settings**
{{customGameSettings}}
game.startgame.channelGreeting.single:
Welcome to your Uno-Channel! Use it to play your cards during the game!

**Basic Commands**
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[play]] <color of card> <number of card | type of card>` to play your cards.
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[draw]]` if you don't have any matching cards.
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[cards]]` if you don't know the name of your card.
 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}[[say]]` to talk to your opponents.

**Enabled Game Settings**
{{customGameSettings}}

info.commands.embed.footer: Use "{{prefix}}cmds <command name>" to get more info on a command.
info.commands.embed.title: {{clientUsername}} Commands
info.guide.commands.desc:
**Turn commands on/off:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings commands <command> [on|off]`]] to toggle the command.
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "<command>" with the name of the command, excluding the prefix.
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "[on|off]", with *on* or *off*.

**Change command cooldowns:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings commands <command> cooldown set <time>`]] to set a cooldown for the command.
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "<time>" with how long (in seconds) you would like the cooldown to last.
 ‚Ä¢ You can view the command's current cooldown by using `{{prefix}}settings commands <command> cooldown view`.

**Whitelist or blacklist commands:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use `{{prefix}}settings commands <command> [whitelist|blacklist] [on|off]` to turn the whitelist/blacklist on or off.
 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings commands <command> [whitelist|blacklist] [add|remove] <user|role>`]] to add or remove a user or role to the whitelist/blacklist.
 ‚Ä¢ A whitelist only allows the people on the list to use the command.
 ‚Ä¢ A blacklist stops only the people on the list from using the command.
 ‚Ä¢ Disabling both will allow anyone to use the command.

**View command settings:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings commands <command> view`]] to see command info like the state, whitelist, and blacklist.
info.guide.commands.title: Changing the Server's Command Settings Guide
info.guide.embed.desc:
:arrow_forward: **Starting a game:**

[[`{{prefix}}guide start`]]
How to start a game of Uno.

:round_pushpin: **Playing your cards:**

[[`{{prefix}}guide play`]]
How to play your cards in a game of Uno.

:speech_balloon: **Changing command settings:**

[[`{{prefix}}guide commands`]]
Change the server's individual command settings.

:gear: **Changing server settings:**

[[`{{prefix}}guide settings`]]
Change the server settings like the prefix and default game settings.

:wrench: **Changing user options:**

[[`{{prefix}}guide options`]]
Change your personal options to tailor your experience.
info.guide.embed.title: {{clientUsername}} Guide
info.guide.info.desc: Tells you an in-depth guide on how to use {{clientUsername}}.
info.guide.options.desc:
‚Ä¢ User options only affect the user's experience, not the entire server's.

**Enabling and disabling options:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}options <option name> [on|off]`]] to turn an option on or off.
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "<option name>" with the name of the option, a list can be found using [[`{{prefix}}options list`]].
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "[on|off]", with *on* or *off*, depending on which you would like.

**View options:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}options view`]] to view your enabled options.
info.guide.options.title: Changing Your User Options
info.guide.play.desc:
**Reading Embeds:**

 ‚Ä¢ Open the uno-channel with your username after you have started a game (using [[`{{prefix}}startgame`]]).
 ‚Ä¢ The pinned message will show some basic commands to play, the options you have enabled, and the game settings that are enabled.
 ‚Ä¢ A message will be sent, telling you the current player and the current card.

**Playing a Card:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use the [[`{{prefix}}play`]] command to play your card. (Use [[`{{prefix}}play help`]] for more command info.)
 ‚Ä¢ The play command  requires a color and a number/type of card.
 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}cards`]] for the names of your cards.
 ‚Ä¢ Your command should look something like this: `{{prefix}}play red 5`.
 ‚Ä¢ If you are playing a wild card, make sure to add the color you want. [[`{{prefix}}play blue wild`]]

**Drawing a Card:**

 ‚Ä¢ If you don't have a card to play, use [[`{{prefix}}draw`]] to draw a card from the deck.
 ‚Ä¢ After drawing your turn will be over, unless the game setting [[DrawUntilMatch]] is on.
info.guide.play.title: Playing Cards Guide
info.guide.settings.desc:
**Changing the prefix:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings prefix <new prefix>`]] to change the prefix.
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "<new prefix>" with your new prefix.

**Add or remove default game settings:**

 ‚Ä¢ Default game settings (DGS) are game settings that will be applied to every game with no game settings automatically.
 ‚Ä¢ Changing DGS require you to vote, which may take a few minutes to update.
 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings dgs <game setting> [on|off|view]` ]]to turn DGS on or off.
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "<game setting>" with a game setting from [[`{{prefix}}gamesettings list`]].
 ‚Ä¢ Replace "[on|off]" with *on* or *off*, depending on if you want to turn the DGS on or off.

**Reset {{clientUsername}}:**

 ‚Ä¢ Use [[`{{prefix}}settings reset`]] to reset {{clientUsername}}.
 ‚Ä¢ This will reset all of the data {{clientUsername}} has on your server.
 ‚Ä¢ When prompted, respond only with "CONFIRM" in all caps to confirm the reset.
info.guide.settings.title: Changing the Server's Settings Guide
info.guide.start.desc:
**Creating a game:**

 ‚Ä¢ Start a game using [[`{{prefix}}startgame`]]. (Use [[`{{prefix}}startgame help`]] for more command info.)
 ‚Ä¢ Add game settings by typing a list of game settings separated by spaces. (A list of game settings can be found with `{{prefix}}gamesettings list`.)
 ‚Ä¢ Your command might look like this: [[`{{prefix}}startgame StackCards, DisableJoin`]].
 ‚Ä¢ A startgame message will be sent which allows you to join, start, and end the game using the reactions, :hand_splayed:, :arrow_forward:, and :x: respectively.
 ‚Ä¢ After 30 seconds or a force start, your game will start.

**Navigating to your channel:**

 ‚Ä¢ A category named 'uno-category' will be created after your game begins.
 ‚Ä¢ A text channel will be created in this category for each player you mentioned.
 ‚Ä¢ The channel is where the player will play their cards.
info.guide.start.title: Starting A Game Guide
